mapper.insert: insert into hier_contract (id, user_id, worker_id, start_time, end_time, settlement, note_taker, record_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{settlement,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, user_id, worker_id, start_time, end_time, settlement, note_taker, record_time from hier_contract
